channel.title: Moparscape questions
channel.description: FIRST, i downloaded moparscape 3.2w/aryan. then i save it to my desktop. after that, i sign in with any name....then any password..ok now i press "login."it says..."error connection to server click "cancel" then "start server" to make you'r own". it says that. so....i do what it say's. and it log's me right into server ip # 127.0.0.1 and i end up with a bronze pick axe in my hand wearing green clothes with all stats 99 and by a mining area east of verac. then i ask ppl how do i go to different server's? he replies "just go to server status and copy the ip addres than put it in new ip address"i do as told and then i press login and it says the following "error connection to server click "cancel" then "start server" to make you'r own"......so i try a new server over and over and over and over and over and is says that same thing each and everytime ffs!(lol)..btw it says hybrid server at the top when i press start server.please tell me how to go into someone elses server to react with them its so boring by you'r self.i know how to make my own server but im to lazy:) so if you know how please reply and tell me thank you i will be very grateful. thank's so much. and have a very merry christmas and happy holiday's!

i do but it just keeps saying the same thing the same thing over and over "error connection to server click “cancel” then “start server” to make you’r own"just keeps saying that…

@phanigk wrote:

just click on file menu above and select new server. then type the ip from server status window. then just make up some login and password and login…

item.title: Moparscape questions
item.dc:creator: @likemage likemage
item.description:
@likemage wrote:

FIRST, i downloaded moparscape 3.2w/aryan. then i save it to my desktop. after that, i sign in with any name…then any password…ok now i press "login."it says…“error connection to server click “cancel” then “start server” to make you’r own”. it says that. so…i do what it say’s. and it log’s me right into server ip # 127.0.0.1
and i end up with a bronze pick axe in my hand wearing green clothes with all stats 99 and by a mining area east of verac. then i ask ppl how do i go to different server’s? he replies "just go to server status and copy the ip addres than put it in new ip address"i do as told and then i press login and it says the following “error connection to server click “cancel” then “start server” to make you’r own”…so i try a new server over and over and over and over and over and is says that same thing each and everytime ffs!(lol)…btw it says hybrid server at the top when i press start server.please tell me how to go into someone elses server to react with them its so boring by you’r self.i know how to make my own server but im to lazy:) so if you know how please reply and tell me thank you i will be very grateful. thank’s so much. and have a very merry christmas and happy holiday’s!

Read full topic
